dict.acceptation: 最低限度；最小量；最低消费；[数]极小值；

sent.orig: Error of minimum zone applies to the criterion of Sphericity Error of minimum condition principle.
sent.trans: 最小区域法是符合最小条件的一种直线度误差评定方法，但较难实现。

sent.orig: Does the AOI program have appropriate parameters programed to cover minimum linewidths, minimum spacing, dishdowns, etc?
sent.trans: AOI程序是否有相应的参数，其涉及到最小线径，最小间距，等？

sent.orig: The minimum bet can be less than the exchange minimum manual bet.
sent.trans: 最小的赌注可能比手工交换最低投注少。

sent.orig: Please quote Order Minimum Quantity and Color Minimum Quantity.
sent.trans: 请报最低数量和颜色为最低起订量。

sent.orig: The two optimal rules is minimum sum of error square and minimum sum of error value.
sent.trans: 这两种最优准则是误差平方和最小和误差绝对值和最小。
